short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional features to the online game Redactle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extending the popular game, Redactle! Redactle is a daily browser game where the user tries to determine the subject of a random obfuscated Wikipedia article. This extension adds new features to the game, including letter counts for the redacted text, and the ability to generate custom or random games and share those game codes to other people with the extension. 

Thanks tp /u/smrq, /u/MeaKyori, and /u/gauss256 who contributed code and ideas for this extension, and as always a huge thank you to John Turner who created the original game!
